title: [Android] "Failed to send a message {:code-32000}" error occurs when attempting to send audio as result all next sent audios are empty

body:
### Steps to reproduce:
1. Send multiple long text messages to enable scrolling in the chat.
2. Begin recording audio by holding down the 'record' button.
3. Scroll within the chat while the audio is being recorded.
4. Release the 'record' button to stop recording.
5. Send the recorded audio by tapping the  'record' button.

### Actual result:
- The audio recording remains on hold after step 4
- The error message "Failed to send a message {:code-32000}" is displayed after step 5
- Subsequent audio messages sent are empty. (can't be played)

https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/52490791/c418485c-ebbc-44db-8638-23e7ec07205a




### Expected result:
- The recorded audio should be successfully sent without any error messages
- The audio should be shown as ready to be sent in the composer as soon as 'record' button is released
![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/52490791/c4f78eca-98c9-43f2-8c5f-7be38d1e6e1a)

- Subsequent audio messages should contain the appropriate audio content.

### Additional info:
The error is not shown for some devices.  As a result, subsequent audio messages will be still sent as empty after steps of this issue
 
### Device:
- Huawei p20 light

[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/files/11464254/Status.log)
